Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: start of my my utxosplitter script, including only 4 values i have ever altered

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content:
`#!/bin/bash
cd "${BASH_SOURCE%/*}" || exit

# Optionally just split UTXOs for a single coin
# e.g "KMD"
specific_coin=$1

kmd_target_utxo_count=9
kmd_split_threshold=6

other_target_utxo_count=9
other_split_threshold=6

date=$(date +%Y-%m-%d:%H:%M:%S)
`

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: You have to uncomment  line 2203 in `iguana/main.c `

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: then rebuild.

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: That will disable the autosplit in iguana.

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Then you can use your own splitter.

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: Yeah if your chains are running and no errors in debug.log then your attention should go to wallet related stuff (size/speed/utxo count/spendable tx eg not mined) and iguana (the notarizer)

Author: Mylo#8306
Content:
Wallet is not part of blockchain, it hold your key and is a database of relevant tx stuff (wallet.dat).   There are no coins in your wallet, it’s all on chain.

Wallet vital data is your key.
